publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2698 Des McNulty:Public Control of Water and Sewerage Provision in Scotland—That the Parliament celebrates the 150 th anniversary of the passage of the Glasgow Corporation Water Works Act in April 1855 which passed control over provision of water supplies from private companies to the public sector and which resulted in the biggest improvement in public health ever seen in Scotland and condemns the latest proposal from the Conservatives to pass control over water and sewerage provision in Scotland back to the private sector. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2698 Des McNulty: Public Control of Water and Sewerage Provision in Scotland—That the Parliament celebrates the 150 th anniversary of the passage of the Glasgow Corporation Water Works Act in April 1855 which passed control over provision of water supplies from private companies to the public sector and which resulted in the biggest improvement in public health ever seen in Scotland and condemns the latest proposal from the Conservatives to pass control over water and sewerage provision in Scotland back to the private sector.
